## Browser.targets() method

All active targets inside the Browser. In case of multiple browser contexts, returns an array with all the targets in all browser contexts.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
targets(): Target[];
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[Target](./puppeteer.target.md)\[\]
